name: Mining Robot
description: Basic autonomous miner. Your first step into the belt.

name: Drill Mk.I
description: Improved extraction head. Needs an operator. Cuts through surface rock in seconds.

name: Drill Mk.II
description: Heavy-duty surface drill. Built for long shifts in the void. Requires trained crew.

name: Asteroid Rig
description: Full mining platform. Drills, crushes, and sorts in one unit. Needs a team.

name: Orbital Station
description: Refinery and logistics hub. The heart of your operation. Crew-intensive.

name: Deep Core Drill
description: Penetrates dense ore layers. Reaches what others can't. Requires specialist crew.

name: Stellar Harvester
description: Harvests rare minerals at scale. Feeds the entire sector.

name: Quantum Extractor
description: Maximum efficiency extraction. Near-instant ore processing. Needs expert crew.

name: Void Crusher
description: Pulverizes asteroid cores. Built for the endgame.

name: Nexus Collector
description: Harvests from multiple dimensions. The ultimate upgrade. Full crew required.
